name: gitmorph-cli
description: Advanced Git operations and developer productivity tool

scripts.install gitmorph-cli: npm i -g gitmorph-cli && echo 'Installation complete! Use "gim" to start using GitMorph CLI.'
scripts.install -g gitmorph-cli: npm i -g gitmorph-cli && echo 'Installation complete! Use "gim" to start using GitMorph CLI.'
scripts.i gitmorph-cli: npm i -g gitmorph-cli && echo 'Installation complete! Use "gim" to start using GitMorph CLI.'
scripts.i -g gitmorph-cli: npm i -g gitmorph-cli && echo 'Installation complete! Use "gim" to start using GitMorph CLI.'
